content: in december 2020 a civil case was heard in the klaipeda district court the defendant was ordered to pay a stamp duty fee of 720 the court awarded the defendant a plot of land garden building and outbuilding in the final resolution of a matrimonial property case the defendant is also responsible for paying off a creditors obligation related to the dissolution of the marriage the applicant waived their claim for compensation of 8930 EUR the defendants share of the common property will be used to deduct half of the remaining amount owed to the bank the text discusses the establishment of asset balance fulfillment of obligations in matrimonial property and shareable property the applicant sought various outcomes including annulment of a contract childs residence payment communication plan division of joint property and retention of surnames the court received statements from a third party and the defendant both agreeing with the claims the court dismissed the case and will decide on the division of property the dissolution of the marriage resulted in joint obligations regarding a credit agreement the applicant paid stamp duty and was exempted from maintenance the defendant was ordered to pay the costs of the proceedings the court ruled in favor of the applicant and ordered a refund of stamp duty the court dissolved the marriage established the defendants residence awarded certain property recognized a debt and ordered repayment the defendant was also ordered to pay stamp duty to the state
